parameter.name: CMSConnectionString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: CMSConnectionString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=tcp:k13sqlserver.database.windows.net,1433;Initial Catalog=K13;Integrated Security=False;Persist Security Info=False;User ID=k13;Password=Abcd@1121;Connect Timeout=60;Encrypt=False;Current Language=English;
